name: Claming Platformer ITCH.IO VERSION
description:
Jump run climb dive

Playable on google or application Avalabile on all pieces of software iOS Android Linux And Windows On Scratch TurboWarp (HTML VERSION) And itch.io version (EXE VERSION)

Want some levels controls and sprites Suggest an idea one will be in the changelog!

IN SCRATCH VERSION

CONTROLS

Move : left right keys

Jump : up key

Climb : touch a wall then jump

Ground pound : Down key While in air

Dive : e key while in air

Exit fan art : Space

Start : enter or tap

Crouch : Down key while touching ground

Credits :

Newgrounds FOR DA TASTY MUSIC

TurboWarp For pressing enter

Thank you Signed :Sleepy
